question: The first India-Sri Lanka Joint Research Symposium was inagurated in _______.
explanation: The inauguration of the first India-Sri Lanka Joint Research Symposium was held in Colombo. It was inaugurated by Science, Technology and Research Minister, Susil Premajayantha, and Indian High Commissioner, Taranjit Singh Sandhu. The Ministry is holding the Symposium to showcase the outcomes from the India-Sri Lanka joint collaboration in Science & Technology.
